comment: Chahe academics ho ya hackathons bro was always the group leader jo puri team ka bojh apne gym mai banaye kandho par utha leta tha💪. Harshit bhau ek naagin dance ho jaye yar 🐍. Will always remember the time jab apan dono ek hi time pe place hue the. Atb for your future bhai.
name: Prathmesh Patil

comment: Gym Bro❤️. Body Bane ya na bane gym jrur jaayenge💪😂. Keep winning bhai. All the best.
name: Devesh Jindal

comment: Harshit Bhai, Smart , Hardworking and really kind. Sab kuch padh bhi lete aur sabko padha bhi dete. Chaar logo se bhi zyada kaam akele krdete. Koi bhi game ho bhai best player hi hoga💪. You are meant to achieve great things in life bro. Bas ek nagin dance ho jaye😂. ATB bhai. Milte Bangalore me😊.
name: Rishabh Sharma

comment: The only guy with amazing development skills. Bhai ke skills academic, coding se leke trading tak sabme hai. The hackathon partner jo pura frontend sambhal leta hai. Stay in touch bro. Aur Chinta mt kr tere saare secrets safe hai mere saath 🙃.
name: Pranav

comment: Harshit bhai, coding bhi, web dev bhi ML bhi, academic bhi, aur saanth saanth movies aur series bhi, bhai sab kaise kar lete ho, din mai toh 24 ghante hi hote hai,? Aise hi rhana bro, obviously you will achieve great things in life, hope aage bhi milna ho, ATB for your future endeavors.
name: Rishi Parsai

comment: Aisa kuch bhi nhi jo Mota Bhai ko na aata ho🔥. Market ka baadshah... bhai koi tip hame bhi de Diya kar. Aur ha assignment time par bana Diya kar yaar chapna bhi hota hai😂
name: Rahul Raut

comment: Bhai all rounder h, sports ho ya academics ya web dev. Ekdum chill banda h🔥. Exam ke time pe apna prof bhi h,very kind and helping. Morse codes to yaad hi rakhonga 😂. ATB for your future endeavors.
name: Dishesh Singh Chaudhary

comment: Exam ko 2 hafte ho ya 2 din, kis baat ki tension hai, Harshit bhai padha dega. Sole supplier for Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V. Protravelo's pro active member, mota bhai
name: Harsh Wardhan Dohaiya

comment: Bhai, tum pehle insaan mile ho jise kathal pasand nahi hai😄. Iske alawa tumme sab kuch aacha hai, hardworking ho, handsome ho, gym bhi karte ho😊. Bas paani ke liye maar peet karna chhod do😄.
name: Mayank Tayal

comment: Harshit, my exam savior! Mota bhai, you've always had my back. That time when I copied a feature from your project, and everyone thought you copied from me—classic mix-up! Thanks for making assignments easy to copy. True legend! 📝🤝
name: Saurabh Kumar Singh

comment: From sharing in my joys to comforting me in my sorrows, you've been my constant companion through every twist and turn of life's journey.I will miss having you by my side every day, Thanks for having me In your Life Bhaiya ❤️
name: Devarapalli Nissi

comment: Gym freak & health conscious Banda. Always ready to help friends in any of the situations. Dinner ke baad walk pe ki gyi bakchodi hamesha yaad rhegi bhai. Tension na le bhai body to bante rhegi abhi khane pine ki Umar hai apan sab ki. Best of luck for your future endeavours and stay in touch bhai 🙌
name: Ashish Agrawal
